PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-03622024-04-18
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of ROY POGORZELSKI of Lethbridge, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis, effective July 22, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ROY POGORZELSKI of Lethbridge, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis, effective July 22, 2024.
